attributes.action: ensure that local authority road inspectors inspect the roads thoroughly and road conditions are drastically improved
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Road inspectors have a duty to inspect road conditions and have a duty to maintain safety of all road users. Any dangerous defects they find should then be imputted into their computerised maintenance record system. Often these inspections are exercised through the inspectors discrestion. This is not good enough, inspections should be done carefully so that potholes get filled and defective manholes are reported to the utilities who rely on the system of inspections operated by the highway authority.
